meanings.definition: Out of proportion; not in correct relation or balance.
meanings.sent1: The tiny cupcake looked disproportional next to the giant cake.
meanings.sent2: The elephant's disproportional ears helped it stay cool in the hot weather.
meanings.sent3: The disproportional clown car made everyone laugh at the circus.
meanings.sent4: Her disproportional love for ice cream was evident in her daily trips to the shop.
meanings.sent5: The disproportional size of the sun in the drawing made it stand out.

meanings.definition: Not proportionate; unequal in size or amount.
meanings.sent1: The disproportional slices of pizza left some guests hungry.
meanings.sent2: The disproportional distribution of toys caused arguments among the children.
meanings.sent3: The disproportional number of cats in the house made it a feline paradise.
meanings.sent4: His disproportional strength made him the star player on the team.
meanings.sent5: The disproportional amount of rain flooded the streets in minutes.
